entry.title: As Turkey's Currency Collapses, Erdogan's Support Sinks Even in His Hometown
entry.content: In President Recep Tayyip Erdogan’s hometown on Turkey’s Black Sea coast, residents are questioning the leadership of their city’s favorite son amid an economic crisis that is driving up the cost of food, gasoline and medicine.

entry.title: China's Quest for Space Power Starts With Moon Dust
entry.content: The country’s lunar program is a key step toward Beijing’s vision of achieving territorial power in space, and scientists think lunar material could one day provide safer nuclear energy in a fusion reactor.
